#summary boxList Binary Data Field

= boxList Binary Data Field =


The media atom must contain a [T_MP4_ISOMediaBoxes_MediaHeaderBox media header atom] ({{{'mdhd'}}}), and it can contain a [T_MP4_ISOMediaBoxes_HandlerBox handler reference] ({{{'hdlr'}}}) atom, [T_MP4_ISOMediaBoxes_MediaInformationBox media information] ({{{'minf'}}}) atom, and [T_MP4_ISOMediaBoxes_UserDataBox user data] ({{{'udta'}}}) atom.

*Serialization Namespace:*  [Bin_N_MP4 MP4]<br>*Assembly:*  MP4 (in MP4.dll)
== Data Serialization ==

=== Field Value ===

Type: [T_MP4_AtomicInfo AtomicInfo][**] — a series of other atoms
